00026 /// \brief
00027 /// The FdoConnectionState enumeration indicates the current state of the connection
00028 /// <param name="FdoConnectionState_Busy">
00029 /// The connection is busy executing one or more commands. Executing another
00030 /// command while the connection is busy will result in an exception.
00031 /// </param>
00032 /// <param name="FdoConnectionState_Closed">
00033 /// The connection is closed.
00034 /// </param>
00035 /// <param name="FdoConnectionState_Open">
00036 /// The connection is open.
00037 /// </param>
00038 /// <param name="FdoConnectionState_Pending">
00039 /// The connection is pending. this is used to indicate that the application has 
00040 /// issued an Open request, but the open is not completed because the application needs to include additional connection property values.
00041 /// </param>
00042 enum FdoConnectionState
00043 {
00044     /// The connection is busy executing one or more commands. Executing another
00045     /// command while the connection is busy will result in an exception.
00046     FdoConnectionState_Busy,
00047 
00048     /// The connection is closed.
00049     FdoConnectionState_Closed,
00050 
00051     /// The connection is open.
00052     FdoConnectionState_Open,
00053 
00054     /// The connection is open.
00055     FdoConnectionState_Pending
00056 };
00057 #endif
00058
